pageTitle: Montreal at Columbus | 2013-11-15 | National Hockey League | Yahoo! Sports
textBeforeTable: Columbus #30, DFP Curtis McElhinney 1) Three Stars A tough season for David Desharnais finally produced a bright spot. Desharnais scored in the shootout - the only time he has found the net all season - and Peter Budaj stopped all three shots he faced in the tiebreaker to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 3-2 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets...
